snippet.title: Invercity / Beta Trailer / PC: Steam, itchio
snippet.description:
Puzzle action game "Invercity" will launch on PC ( Steam, Itch.io ) in 2022 !

Official Web：https://marudice.com/invercity/en
Steam：comming soon
Twitter：@dice_maru_en

“Handstand” reverses gravity for all objects but you for the physics principal law; “things fall to bottom”.

Now if you look at it upside down… it will be replaced with hanging.
Because it “looks” that way.

Invercity is a puzzle-platformer that features “Handstand”.

Panic in the city due to the “Handstand phenomenon” where things fall into the sky!
A reporter who loves handstand was chosen to cover the event.
While covering various parts of the city, follow the mystery of the “Handstand phenomenon”!

Game contest unity1week#15 winner
